data.description:
Corpus is a cutting-edge mixed reality application designed for medical students and professionals to explore and master human anatomy in an engaging and interactive way. With Corpus, you gain access to a highly detailed and anatomically precise model of the human body, enabling you to delve into the intricacies of organs, muscles, ligaments, vessels, and nerves right from your home. 

Set up your own virtual dissection room and immerse yourself in the world of anatomy like never before. Corpus integrates with DocCheck Flexikon, a medical Wiki, offering you hundreds of well-structured learning texts, supplemented by informative videos. With Corpus, you can deepen your anatomical knowledge efficiently and effectively. 

Challenge your understanding with our quiz mode. Whether you're an anatomy expert or just starting, test your skills and see how you measure up.

changelog.change_log:
content changes:
- added new bodypart: right leg
- added new bodypart: head

functional changes:
- added new feature: quiz (the user is tasked to find a specified structure within the currently viewed bodypart)
- added new feature: sections (highly detailed bodyparts are further segmented into different sections, which can be switched between on the fly)
- continued to incrementally improve overall user experience

* Verbesserung des Onboardings
* Generelle Verbesserung der UI & UX
* Allgemeine Anpassungen im App-Ablauf
